content.raw:
It looks like your ground color is a bit off. Mine gets like this when I forget to source the setup file before running `./deploy.sh -m` (for my installation: `. /usr/local/share/gazebo-4.0/setup.sh `)

Are your textures specified in a COLLADA file? Can you try rendering with `gzclient` to see if they show up there?
content.html:
It looks like your ground color is a bit off. Mine gets like this when I forget to source the setup file before running ./deploy.sh -m (for my installation: . /usr/local/share/gazebo-4.0/setup.sh)

Are your textures specified in a COLLADA file? Can you try rendering with gzclient to see if they show up there?
